15.name: Tinkerer
15.description: Two helms really are better than one.

26.name: Dredge Slayer
26.description: Become the enemy of the collective by killing dredge.

28.name: Ettin Slayer
28.description: Just goes to show: two heads are not better than one.

150.name: Sapphire Sanctum
150.description: Unlock the treasures in the Sapphire Sanctum.

170.name: Kegmaster
170.description: 99 kegs of ale on the wall!

192.name: Eternity's Epitome
192.description: Just how many Subject Alphas are there?

bits.text: Story Mode
Explorable Mode—Submarine Path
Explorable Mode—Teleporter Path
Explorable Mode—Front Door Path

278.name: Champion Illusionist
278.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a mesmer.

297.name: It's Quite Roomy in Here
297.description: Towers are like a second home to you.

362.name: It's a Mad King's World
362.description: Explore the Mad Realm...or die trying.
362.requirement: Explore  areas in the Mad Realm.

385.name: Swampland Fractal Stabilizer
385.description: Shifting trees won't stop you. The Mossman will.
385.requirement: You've completed the Swampland fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

725.name: You've Got the Moves
725.requirement: Obtain Signature Moves by defeating all six Masters of Om.

901.name: Power Play
901.requirement: Defend the eastern, northern, and western Vigil batteries, and kill Tequatl during a single encounter.

951.name: Fire or Flora
951.requirement: Complete either a Citadel of Flame or Twilight Arbor dungeon (story or explorable).

1050.name: Halloween Costume-Brawl Champion IV
1050.description: Emerge as a champion from a costume brawl.

1139.name: Tower of Nightmares High Diver
1139.requirement: Use the diving goggles and jump from the top of the Tower of Nightmares.

1144.name: Fractal Fortnight: Battleground
1144.description: The city is yours! What's left of it anyways.
1144.requirement: You've completed the Urban Battleground fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1211.name: Aftermath Toxic Boss Slayer I
1211.requirement: Defeat the toxic spider queen, toxic wurm queen, toxic alchemist, or toxic warlock.

1273.name: Wintersday Snowball Slinger II
1273.description: Give players a cold welcome with a snowball.
1273.requirement: Hit  players with snowballs during Wintersday.

1279.name: Yay, Wintersday Presents III
1279.description: Oooh, I wonder what's in there.

1322.name: Boss Thumper VI
1322.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1341.name: Wurm Decapitator
1341.requirement: Decapitate  head of the great jungle wurm in Bloodtide Coast.

bits.text: Amber Wurm
Crimson Wurm
Cobalt Wurm

1342.name: Triple Trouble
1342.requirement: Complete  great jungle wurm achievement in Bloodtide Coast.

1375.name: Smash Happy
1375.requirement: Purchase Koda's Hammer at the forge.

1393.name: Three Fronts
1393.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1393.requirement: Capture all 3 rally points and begin retaking Lion's Arch.

1403.name: Harsh Detox
1403.requirement: Kill members of the Toxic Alliance in Lion's Arch.

1513.name: Keep Your Distance
1513.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1513.requirement: Defeat the Aetherblade Admiral without being hit by her teleport attack.

1573.name: Boss Blitz: Wallop Wiggin
1573.requirement: Defeat Wiggin the Wicked during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

1586.name: Crate Consumer
1586.requirement: Open  Zephyr Sanctum Supply Box in the Labyrinthine Cliffs.

1587.name: Welcoming Party
1587.requirement: Complete the Official Greetings instance in Lion's Arch.

1648.name: Dashed Advantage
1648.requirement: Find the secret passage and secure some extra crystals for the fight.

1726.name: Krait Antiquarianism Study
1726.requirement: Unlock all of the krait weapons in your wardrobe, and collect a Krait Scale.
1726.locked_text: Loot a Krait Scale from krait throughout Tyria.

1737.name: Aetherized Weapon Collection
1737.description: <c=@flavor>Join your sky pirate brothers and sisters in spirit by unlocking all the aetherized weapon skins.</c>
1737.requirement: Unlock all  Aetherized weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1846.name: Daily WvW Invasion Defender
1846.requirement: Defeat enemy invaders in World vs. World.

1907.name: Daily Conundrum Cubed Jumping Puzzle
1907.requirement: Complete the Conundrum Cubed jumping puzzle in Mount Maelstrom.

1954.name: Daily Timberline Falls Event Completer
1954.requirement: Complete events in Timberline Falls in the Shiverpeak Mountains.

2027.name: Wintersday Weapon Collection
2027.requirement: Unlock all  Wintersday weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2257.name: Pact Camper
2257.description: Establishing law and order wherever you go.

bits.text: Cleared Pact Encampment
Escorted Officer to Camp
Elected Camp Leader
Recovered Cannons
Calibrated Mordrem Detectors
Escorted Survivors to Camp
Saved Sylvari from Vigilantes
Destroyed Corruption Source
Interrogated Sylvari Suspects

2283.name: The Golden Chicken
2283.description: If a gold chicken exists, where would it hide in a golden city?
2283.requirement: Find a gold chicken in Tarir.

2301.name: Peer Review
2301.description: Story Instance: Prisoners of the Dragon
2301.requirement: Explore the mesas and follow the ornithologist's trail of clues to verify or disprove his hypothesis.

2302.name: Mistward Warboots
2302.requirement: Collect all  items and skins to forge your Mistward Warboots.
2302.locked_text: Complete the Corruption revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Warboots collection.

bits.text: Dropped by Inquest enemies.
Defeat the karka queen in Southsun Cove.
Purchase for Bandit Crests in the Silverwastes.

2334.name: Drone Race: Gold
2334.requirement: Boost and blast your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2484.name: The Floor Is Lava?: Silver
2484.requirement: Kick rockvine fruit and retrieve as many spores as you can before time runs out!

2652.name: Last Cannon
2652.requirement: Leave one cannon operational for the entire fight, and then defeat Sabetha.

2663.name: Piecing It Together
2663.requirement: Read all the journal entries to learn more about the bandits.

bits.text: Lying in the shade.
Picked apart.
Taken out back.
Far side of the bridge.
Lost in the rubble.
Among the dead.
Dried off.
Drowned.
When the bough breaks.
Prison guard.
Our little secret.
The cradle will rock.
Chimney sweep.

2683.name: League Engineer—Elite
2683.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Elite achievement.
2683.requirement: Win 10 ranked matches as an engineer.

2736.name: Finish Your Ascension
2736.description: Play in ranked matches to advance achievements.
2736.requirement: Complete the meta-achievement Path of Ascension III: Monument of Legends.

2848.name: Interior Design 201
2848.requirement: Smash ten pieces of furniture in World 2, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

2849.name: Interior Design 102
2849.requirement: Smash ten pieces of furniture in World 1, Zone 2 of Super Adventure Box.

2866.name: Study Aids
2866.requirement: Use each of the power-ups in Super Adventure Box once.

bits.text: Invisibility
Speed Boost
Invincibility
Damage Boost

2913.name: Chuka and Champawat IV: Baby Book
2913.description: "This book is a record of the times my tiger cubs and I shared."

bits.text: Talk to Cymbel in Fields of Ruin.

Craft Tiger Nesting Materials and deposit them at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

Craft a Heat Stone and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from merchants in Dry Top.

Craft Artificial Tiger Milk and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

Craft Nutritional Tiger Milk and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

Craft Infused Tiger Milk and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

Craft Basic Tiger Food and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

Craft Nutritional Tiger Food and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

Craft Infused Tiger Food and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

Craft a Tough Leather Ball and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

Craft a Scratching Post and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

After completing the Scratching Post, craft a Tiger Pole and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.

After completing the Tiger Pole, craft a Tiger Gym and deposit it at your den.
Recipe obtained from Cymbel.
Talk to Shaman Sigarr in Wayfarer Foothills.
Talk to Shaman Sigarr in Wayfarer Foothills.

2947.name: Daily Tier 4 Underground Facility
2947.requirement: Complete Underground Facility at fractal scale 76 or higher.

2985.name: Daily Tier 2 Molten Boss
2985.requirement: Complete Molten Boss at fractal scale 26 or higher.

3003.name: Cavalier Weapon Collection
3003.requirement: Unlock all  Cavalier weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3135.name: Daily Ember Bay Destroyer Boss or Wurm Boss
3135.requirement: Slay the destroyer boss or the wurm boss.

3146.name: Colossal Offense
3146.requirement: Neutralize  enemy capture point during rated Eternal Coliseum matches.

3179.name: Larva Conservationist
3179.requirement: Defeated the Unstable Abomination while inflicting a minimum of mayhem on the surrounding larvae.

3363.name: Monster Hunter
3363.description: The Forest of Niflhel is deadly to all but the most skilled.
3363.requirement: Earn glory in the Forest of Niflhel by completing these achievements.

3375.name: Foefire Defender
3375.requirement: Defeat  enemy while defending your team's capture points during Legacy of the Foefire rated matches.

3477.name: Siren's Landing Insight: Kelp Rock
3477.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Siren's Landing.

3540.name: In Bloom
3540.description: Look in the face of death...
3540.requirement: Defeat Skorvald the Shattered without being hit by a Solar Bloom explosion.

3554.name: Daily Vabbi Event Completer
3554.requirement: Complete events in the Domain of Vabbi.

3566.name: Crystalline Memories
3566.requirement: Search for a relic from the past.

3576.name: The Whole Story
3576.requirement: Stop and watch all of the memories.

3577.name: Gate of Good-Byes
3577.requirement: Collect all of the weapon pieces and then forge them together in the fires of a dwarven furnace.

bits.text: Found in a lava-covered room deep inside Derelict Delve.
Found in a lava-covered room deep inside Derelict Delve.
Found in a lava-covered room deep inside Derelict Delve.
Found in a lava-covered room deep inside Derelict Delve.
A forgotten forge inside the Derelict Delve.

3648.name: No Deductible
3648.requirement: Make it to the Crystal Desert without crashing Kiel's airship.

3724.name: Prison Breaker
3724.description: Villagers who don't meet their farming quotas are taken to the Deadhouse, where Warden Jabari turns them into Awakened.
3724.requirement: In a single prison break, destroy all of the cell doors to free villagers and defeat Warden Jabari to free Emara.

3748.name: Puzzle in Time
3748.requirement: Complete the Sunspear puzzle within the time limit.

3785.name: Adept Deadeye
3785.requirement: Begin training the thief's deadeye elite specialization.

3796.name: The Collection of Tribute
3796.description: <c=@Flavor>Rulers of the Primeval Dynasty developed their kingdom's material resources, accruing great wealth and power for themselves and for their subjects.</c>
3796.requirement: Gather and combine  tributes from Elonian gathering nodes.

bits.text: Gather 10 chunks of granite from rare mining nodes in Oasis.
Gather 10 planks of Tamarisk from rare lumber nodes in the Desert Highlands.
Gather 10 late-blooming Elon lilies from flax nodes in the Elon Riverlands.
Gather 10 ancient surveyor's tools from buried chests in the Desolation.
Gather 10 bunches of rare grapes from desert vegetation nodes in the Domain of Vabbi.

3839.name: Keen Eye
3839.requirement: Kill the real Queen Nadijeh and real Queen Dahlah without killing any of their clones during their split illusion phases.

3846.name: Raise the Banners: Sunspear Support
3846.description: You advised Amnoon's council to defy King Joko and fly the standard of his Sunspear enemies.
3846.requirement: Collect all  items to unlock this piece of equipment.

bits.text: Suggest that Amnoon support the Order of the Sunspears in the story step "Blazing a Trail."
Search the caves near the Lair of the Forgotten in the Desolation.
Purchase from Adisa in the Ustulate Barrens of the Elon Riverlands.
Purchase from Drojkor, Spirit Squall in the Djinn Enclave high above the Desolation.
Drops from the Zawadi the Turncoat bounty target in the Desolation.
Drops from the Terror of the Sands bounty target in the Elon Riverlands.
Search for these within the Deadhouse in the Elon Riverlands.
Awarded for completing the story step "The Sacrifice."
Awarded for completing the story step "Crystalline Memories."
Awarded for completing the story step "Facing the Truth."
Awarded for completing the story step "The Way Forward."
Awarded for completing the story step "Bringing Out the Archon."
Awarded for completing the story step "Enemy of My Enemy."
Earn by speaking to Second Spear Nayrim in the story step "Small Victory."

3896.name: Hidden Carrot Hunt
3896.description: Someone from Highjump Ranch has hidden carrots. Find them to win the game.
3896.requirement: Use your springer to find and collect carrots in the Brightwater Inlet.

bits.text: Brightwater Inlet 01
Brightwater Inlet 02
Brightwater Inlet 03
Brightwater Inlet 04
Brightwater Inlet 05
Brightwater Inlet 06
Brightwater Inlet 07
Brightwater Inlet 08
Brightwater Inlet 09
Brightwater Inlet 10

3897.name: Roads Less Traveled
3897.description: Sometimes it's good to stop and take a break.
3897.requirement: Find Priory Historian Elisa located somewhere in the Crystal Desert region.

3922.name: Mad Memorial
3922.requirement: Track down firsthand accounts of Mad King Thorn's afterlife during Halloween, when the Mad Realm draws near.

bits.text: In the Mad King's city, a noble observes a kindred spirit far from home, a cauldron brewing with grim omens.
Watching over a maze of bloodshed, the ferryman waits to direct the king's guests.
At the heart of a labyrinth, the Mad King's most faithful servant toils at his tasks.
Carving out warnings where the king holds court, a rider makes his yearly rounds.
A general prepares for an eternal war, waiting at the gates to another world's battles.
Above the muck and saltwater, a garden stage is decorated in celebration of a royal return.

3979.name: Death Eater
3979.requirement: Defeat the Voice in the Void on challenge mode.

4003.name: Stop Right There
4003.description: Story Instance: The Hero of Istan
4003.requirement: Defeat the Awakened guard who goes to check on the riot before he can reach the top of the stairwell.

4175.name: Master Diver: Lornar's Pass
4175.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
4175.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Lornar's Pass.

4179.name: Master Diver: Timberline Falls
4179.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
4179.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Timberline Falls.

4236.name: Seized
4236.requirement: Help Gorrik and Blish get out of trouble, and stop an emerging threat to the city of Amnoon.

4276.name: Zephyrite Lost and Found
4276.requirement: Find fallen Zephyrite kite baskets throughout Tyria and loot their contents.

4286.name: Boss Blitz: Slaughter Sparcus
4286.requirement: Defeat Sparcus Firesplash during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

4289.name: Banisher of Legends
4289.requirement: Defeat a legendary boss during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

4294.name: Centaur Culler
4294.requirement: Kill  centaur in the Crown Pavilion.

4479.name: Rolling Ace: Infernal Leap
4479.requirement: Complete a lap of the roller beetle race in Mount Maelstrom within the challenge time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4526.name: Daily Tier 3 Siren's Reef
4526.requirement: Completed Siren's Reef at Fractal Scale 51 or Higher

4536.name: Savage Cannoneer
4536.description: Send ghosts back to their graves with the shadow cannons.
4536.requirement: Using the shadow cannons, deliver the killing blow to  ghosts in the Siren's Reef fractal.

4547.name: Chasing Tales: Anatomy and Physiology
4547.description: A good butcher must know his medium.
4547.requirement: Inflict 60 conditions while wielding a sword in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Carver the Carver.
Inflicted 60 conditions with a sword in Thunderhead Peaks.

4566.name: Chasing Tales: Guidance
4566.description: The forge master may have an idea on how to improve your Dragonsblood weapons.
4566.requirement: Find a way to enhance your weapons.

4579.name: Hazardous Materials: Gold
4579.requirement: Successfully deliver volatile oil to Audree at Ironhammer Crossing.

4613.name: Chasing Tales: Deadly Accuracy
4613.description: Baverne's marks never once eluded her.
4613.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a rifle in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Baverne the Hunter.
Defeated 30 enemies with a rifle in Thunderhead Peaks.

4617.name: Trial by Fire
4617.requirement: Avoid getting hit by Branded Aurene's breath attacks.

4679.name: Daily Dragonfall Melandru's Lost Domain Creature Slayer
4679.requirement: Kill 25 creatures in Melandru's Lost Domain in Dragonfall.

4760.name: Visions of Kourna
4760.description:
Eternal life, either blessing or curse, squandered by greed and the thirst for power.

Note: Completion of this achievement requires completion of the Riding Skyscales achievement.
4760.requirement: Explore the Domain of Kourna for greater insight.
4760.locked_text: Purchase a Trance Stone from any Volatile Magic vendor to unlock this collection.

4782.name: Demigoddess of the Arena
4782.requirement: Finish the season in 2nd place on the skill rating leaderboard.

4811.name: Mini Skyscale Hatchling Collection
4811.requirement: Unlock all skyscale hatchling minis in your wardrobe.

4838.name: (Annual) Hologram Herder
4838.requirement: Participate in Hologram Stampede events. This achievement can be completed once per year.

4845.name: Annual Feats
4845.requirement: Complete the (Annual) Dragon Bash Feats achievement. This achievement can only be completed once per year.

4846.name: (Annual) So Lifelike
4846.requirement: Vanquish holographic dragon minions. This achievement can be completed once per year.

4874.name: (Annual) Boss Blitz: Wallop Wiggin
4874.requirement: Defeat Wiggin the Wicked during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4922.name: Champion of All
4922.requirement: Represent each legion at the Demolition Derby.

bits.text: Flame
Iron
Blood
Ash

4954.name: Grothmar Tribune
4954.requirement: Complete the Grothmar Legionnaire daily meta-achievement in Grothmar Valley 15 times.

4992.name: Talk of the Town
4992.requirement: Hear the initial aftermath of the opening ceremony.

4998.name: Mad Armory: Carapace of Chaos
4998.description: The storehouses of the Mad Realm contain many artifacts crafted by the Lunatic Court at their king's behest. Although tales of the Shell of Insanity have spread, its descendant works have remained forgotten—until now.
4998.requirement: Show your allegiance to the Lunatic Court by performing various feats while in a ghostly form from eating certain Halloween foods.

bits.text: Eat this seasonal treat to receive a temporary ghostly aura.
While under the ghostly aura of certain Halloween foods, loot the chest atop the Vizier's Tower in Straits of Devastation.
While under the ghostly aura of certain Halloween foods, collect the final reward of any explorable path of the Ruined City of Arah.
While under the ghostly aura of certain Halloween foods, loot the final chest of the Deepstone fractal.
While under the ghostly aura of certain Halloween foods, vanquish Tequatl the Sunless and loot its chest.

5097.name: Flawless Fallen
5097.requirement: Defeat the Fallen Voice and Fallen Claw without being hit by any damaging fields.

bits.text: Purchased from low-level karma merchants in Plains of Ashford, Wayfarer Foothills, Queensdale, Caledon Forest, and Metrica Province.
Purchased from low-level karma merchants in Plains of Ashford, Wayfarer Foothills, Queensdale, Caledon Forest, and Metrica Province.
Purchased from Strum Bassclash in Plains of Ashford, Shaman Vigmarr in Wayfarer Foothills, Fisher Travis in Queensdale, Elain in Caledon Forest, and Blopp in Metrica Province.
Drops for players at or below level 10 when they defeat foes.
Drops for players at or below level 10 when they defeat foes.
Drops for players at or below level 10 when they defeat foes.
Drops for players at or below level 10 when they defeat foes.

Complete one of the Novice Explorer achievements.
Dodge tutorials are in Plains of Ashford, Wayfarer Foothills, Queensdale, Caledon Forest, and Metrica Province.
Craft a food item of level 5 or lower.
Consume a crafted food item of level 5 or lower.

5169.name: League Slayer—2v2 Season One
5169.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 2v2 Season One.

5204.name: Visions of the Past: Confronting Canach
5204.description: Defeat the fugitive Canach in his island hideaway. [Living World Season 1 vision: Canach's Lair. Accessed via the Scrying Pool in the Eye of the North.]

5209.name: Delving for Treasure
5209.requirement: While journeying through Darkrime Delves in the Scrying Pool's visions, explore to find lost treasures.

5229.name: Vishen Steelshot's Footsteps
5229.requirement:
Collect items related to Vishen Steelshot's history to earn her signature Steel Warband sniper rifle.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Icebrood Saga episodes to complete.</c>

bits.text: Found inside an Emissary Chest in the Eye of the North after completing a Steel Warband vision.
Found in Eye of the North.
Found inside the chest at the end of the Gauntlet of the Khan-Ur jumping puzzle in Grothmar Valley.
Awarded for prowess in marksmanship in Grothmar Valley.
Found inside a chest on the Crimson Plateau jumping puzzle in Diessa Plateau.
Purchase from Lakor Grizzlemouth in the village of Butcher's Block in Diessa Plateau.
Finish the Wall Breach Blitz in Diessa Plateau.
Found in the Blood Keep in Grothmar Valley.
Found in the chest at the end of Chaos Crystal Cavern jumping puzzle in Iron Marches.
Chance to drop from Inquest enemies. Guaranteed from Golem Mark II or Mark III Suppressor Golem.
Crafted or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Found on an overlook at Terra Carorunda in Blazeridge Steppes.
Speak with Vishen after defeating the Ancient Forgeman.
Found in the Ash Legion's files of Recon Cove in Grothmar Valley.
Found inside a chest at the end of a light puzzle in Bjora Marches.
Found inside an Emissary Chest in Eye of the North after opening it with three crystals.

5247.name: Morale Breaker
5247.requirement: Defeat the Minister of Morale  times in the Cold War Strike Mission.

5280.name: Special Mission: Lies and Statistics
5280.requirement: Destroy 50 propaganda balloons at the overlook or fortress locations.
5280.locked_text: Unlock by using Ash Legion Special Mission Documents.

5317.name: Special Mission: Pillage the Lighthouse
5317.requirement: Destroy  structures at Lighthouse Point in Drizzlewood Coast.

5331.name: Mysterious Journal
5331.requirement: Collect  scraps of paper in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5410.name: Impressive Pugilist
5410.requirement: Use impressive maneuvers to impress the Spirit of the Wild with your fighting prowess while inside the Arena of the Wolverine.

bits.text: Break the Wolverine Spirit's Defiance.
Dodge two attacks back-to-back.
Dodge an attack, and then land a critical hit immediately after.
Avoid taking damage from fire fields.
Avoid being snared.
Avoid being hit by shock waves.

5475.name: Top Dragon Responder: Brisban Wildlands
5475.requirement: Complete  Brisban Wildlands Dragon Response Mission with all challenges active.

5497.name: Daily Brisban Wildlands Dragon Response Mission
5497.requirement: Complete the Brisban Wildlands Dragon Response Mission.

5508.name: Swift Cleanup
5508.requirement: Clear the docks within the time limit during the Primordus Rising story chapter.

5518.name: Jormag's Madness
5518.requirement: Complete the story chapter Jormag's Madness.

5545.name: Volcanic Stormcaller Armaments Collector
5545.requirement: Unlock all Volcanic Stormcaller weapon skins in your wardrobe.
5545.locked_text: Forged to fight Jormag's icebrood, the Stormcaller armaments resist Jormag's influence but become easily corrupted by Primordus's destroyer magic.

5592.name: Exalted Global Ranks
5592.requirement: Speak with the Crystal Bloom field leader in the Eye of the North once the global support goals have been met.

5658.name: Friendly Fire
5658.requirement: While the Powerful Foes challenge is active, keep all Flame Legion legionnaires alive while defending the Flame Citadel during the Fireheart Rise Dragon Response Mission.

5715.name: Return to Disturbance in Brisban Wildlands
5715.requirement: Complete the mission Disturbance in Brisban Wildlands in Living World Season 2, Episode 1.

5770.name: Crop Harvester: Lake Doric
5770.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Lake Doric.

5791.name: Woodland Management: Bloodstone Fen
5791.requirement: Log wood  times in Bloodstone Fen.

5835.name: Return to The Waypoint Conundrum
5835.requirement: Complete the mission The Waypoint Conundrum in Living World Season 2 Episode 3.

5844.name: Wrath of the Twisted Marionette Global Victory
5844.requirement: Speak with the Mist Stranger in the Eye of the North once the global goals have been met.

5860.name: League Participator—3v3 Season Four
5860.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 3v3 Season Four.

5903.name: Revenge of the Icebrood Construct
5903.requirement: Participate in the successful completion of Storms of Winter in Bjora Marches.

5907.name: World Boss Rush Global Ranks
5907.requirement: Enter a capital city or a map containing a world boss once the global goals have been met.

5908.name: Revenge of Drakkar
5908.requirement: Prevent Drakkar from becoming more powerful by aiding Jhavi in her attack.

5971.name: Ore Miner: Bjora Marches
5971.requirement: Mine ore  times in Bjora Marches.

6063.name: (Weekly) Lunar Festivities
6063.description: Weekly achievement. Progress resets on Monday morning.
6063.requirement: Participate in the Firecracker Lightning adventures, lunar mount race, and Celestial Challenge. Progress awarded varies based on the activity.

6100.name: Seitung Province Insight: Airship Wreckage
6100.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6109.name: I'm Very Buoyant
6109.description: You can fish your whole life without understanding it was never the fish you were truly after.

6113.name: This Isn't Cannon
6113.requirement: Avoid all cannon fire and spinning traps.

6127.name: Shock-Wave Jumper
6127.requirement: Jump over 10 shock waves from Soo-Won's claw slam.

6275.name: Mai Goodness
6275.description: Who knew the well of Mai ran so deep?
6275.requirement: Find all files, logs, and other clues to learn about Mai Trin's time with Xunlai Jade.

6380.name: Weekly Echovald Wilds Jade Treasure Recovery
6380.description: Bring recovered treasures to Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault.
6380.requirement: Complete the Gang War of Echovald.

6515.name: Dancing Barefoot
6515.description: Kicked off your shoes and got down with your bad self!

6520.name: Fetch Quest
6520.requirement: Trade odds and ends with canine merchants in Lion's Arch for prizes of debatable value, then unbox them.

6542.name: A Test of Your Reflexes
6542.requirement: Complete the Kaineng Overlook Strike Mission with challenge mode active without being hit by Crouching Dragon Wave or Dash.

6626.name: Adventure Guide: Volume Four
6626.requirement: Complete 20 Adventure Guide: Volume Four achievements.
6626.locked_text: This achievement is locked until Adventure Guide: Volume Three is complete.

6660.name: Earning Crafting Levels I
6660.requirement:
Earn 10 crafting levels.

<c=@reminder>Craft items to earn crafting experience for that crafting discipline, allowing you to create more powerful items.</c>

6685.name: Investigative Record 1
6685.requirement: Find and listen to hidden logs from the source of the chaos.

bits.text: Recording 1 (Scarlet's Playhouse)
Recording 2 (Scarlet's Playhouse)

6749.name: The Nightmare Incarnate
6749.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Nightmare Incarnate.

6752.name: The Nightmare Ends
6752.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Nightmare Ends.

6788.name: Static-Dynamic Synergy
6788.requirement: Do not trigger any Gravitational Waves during Dual Horizon attacks. Do not take maximum damage from either Pernicious Vortex or Crackling Wind. Then, defeat the Triumvirate without dying.

6806.name: Tower Purifier 2
6806.requirement: Complete events in the Tower of Nightmares to bring an end to its twisted evils.

6867.name: Champions of the Delve
6867.requirement: Defeat each of the champions that appear after the Jade Crisis meta-event.

bits.text: Twisted Skelk (Island)
Twisted Skelk (Cavern)
Abyssal
Mushroom King

7057.name: Reader of Notes
7057.requirement: Find all the readable notes while following Zojja.

bits.text: Read a letter.
Read field notes.

7101.name: Legendary Weapon: The Bifrost
7101.requirement: Craft the legendary weapon The Bifrost.

7214.name: Astral Thought
7214.requirement: Gather the necessary armor skins and defeat Ignaxious to unlock the ability to purchase the Arcanum of Astral Thought from the Wizard's Tower.

7605.name: WvW Rush Camp Capturer 2
7605.requirement: Capture supply camps for your realm in World versus World.

7639.name: WvW Rush Castle Capturer
7639.requirement: Capture Stonemist Castle for your realm in World vs. World.

7649.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Thirty-Nine
7649.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Nine.

7728.name: Heitor's Gate
7728.requirement: Enter the fortress and confront Heitor.

7828.name: Artisan of Arms: Ranger's Mace
7828.description: Creative use of maces offers rangers a dual-wielding option for utility support for themselves and their allies.
7828.requirement: Defeat enemies with a mace as a ranger.

7887.name: Ultimate Phantom
7887.description: Walking the line between life and death—your life, their death.
7887.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a necromancer.

7951.name: Jade Sea Veteran
7951.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8024.name: Sovereign of Nayos
8024.requirement: Meet with your allies in the Wizard's Tower.

8033.name: Vizunah Square Veteran
8033.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8040.name: We're Never Alone but We're Isolated
8040.requirement: Complete the Lonely Tower fractal on challenge mode 25 times.

8041.name: Event Collection: Spire of Creation
8041.requirement: Participate in  successful events in the Spire of Creation.

bits.text: Descend the Spire of Creation.
Siege the hatchery and destroy the abyssal watchers.
Continue descending the Spire of Creation.
Defeat Charybda the Cunning.

8087.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Demon Knight: Silver
8087.requirement: Earn silver-rank timing or better in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

8088.name: Peitha Protector
8088.requirement: Prevent Peitha's health from dropping below 90%.

8119.name: Revenge of the High Sage (Weekly)
8119.requirement: Defeat the Harathi High Sage and the massive earth elemental it summons.

8133.name: Hablion's Revenge (Weekly)
8133.requirement: Defeat the Ghostly Justiciar in the Colosseum of the Faithful, located above Bloodstone Fen.

8194.name: Hunting in the Grasslands
8194.description: Open skies and not a lot of places to hide. Better be quick.
8194.requirement: Defeat dangerous creatures in Lupine Fields, Bjorn Thicket, and Moon Camp Covert.

bits.text: Received a report about a rather large, hostile wolf in the caves near Moon Camp.
Received a report about a large and hostile iboga south of Moon Camp.
Received a report about a group being ambushed by a large mushroom while gathering mushrooms in the Bjorn Thicket.
Received a report about a large warg rampaging through Lupine Fields.
Received a report of valravn at the cliffs near Lupine Fields.

8219.name: Janthir Syntri Warclaw Run: Gold
8219.description: Someone's getting a couple of fish for supper.
8219.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Janthir Syntri Warclaw Run adventure.

8222.name: Relaxed and Rejuvenated
8222.description: Take advantage of the lowlander's relaxing hot springs. They're brimming with healthy minerals and nutrients!

8249.name: Build-a-Quaggan
8249.description: What makes Mr. Quiggles so special? You decide!
8249.requirement: Collect materials for the kodan of Forager's Hunt to make their own stuffed toys.
8249.locked_text: Play through the Guild Wars 2: Janthir Wilds story chapter Finding Balance to unlock this collection.

bits.text: Speak with Chilly Tarn. You may be able to find her at Forager's Hunt.
Gather weavable plant fibers. Some say they grow only near rivers that run with blood.
Find some form of stuffing. Gendarran Fields is Tyria's largest producer of wool.
Find a mechanical frame. Where might inventors gather?
Talk with kodan cubs about the coolest toys. These four cubs love to chat around the local watering hole.
Find a small pair of wings. Check the hinterlands, where flying things are born.
Find a squeaker. A new merchant in one of Tyria's largest cities might have one of these for sale.
Choose a rock for a heart. These can be found where the hills echo and the current carries the salty tang of seawater.
Return to Forager's Hunt—it's time to make a new Mr. Quiggles!

8251.name: Golden Rescue
8251.description: A friend to critters large and small.
8251.requirement: Achieve gold on the Save Woodland Creatures adventure.

8311.name: (Repeatable) Janthir Syntri: Festering Basin Renown Heart
8311.description: You're why the bearkin can rest at ease.
8311.requirement: Successfully complete the Festering Basin Renown Heart on  unique days.

8395.name: Returning to Elona
8395.requirement: Meet with Spearmarshal Zaeim in Amnoon Oasis to learn about the Return to Path of Fire event.

8423.name: Revenge of the Pestilent Golem (Weekly)
8423.requirement: Destroy the plague experiments in the Inquest lab.

8450.name: Serpent's Wrath Weapon Collector
8450.requirement: Unlock all  Serpent's Wrath weapon skins by defeating champions in Janthir Wilds maps or by purchasing them from the Trading Post and binding them to you.

8452.name: Arrow Cart Expertise
8452.requirement: Damage players and siege equipment with arrow carts.

8572.name: A Cappella
8572.description: Those who join Yagon's twisted choir are doomed to sing forever.
8572.requirement: Succumb to spectral agony in the Valley of Agony.

8601.name: Calm Before the Storm
8601.description: Be unflappable before the godsquall's fury.
8601.requirement: With the challenge mote active, prevent Decima from receiving any charge. Allow no conduits to be charged by standard Fluxlance beams or Chorus of Thunder bolts aimed at squad members.

8602.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Skywatch Archipelago
8602.description: Well then, whaddaya say we get back home?
8602.requirement: Complete events in Skywatch Archipelago. Group events will award more progress.

8608.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Seitung Province
8608.description: When life doesn't give your homestead what you need, you just gotta take it yourself. Life's not fair, so why play by its rules?
8608.requirement: Complete events in Seitung Province. Group events will award more progress.

8654.name: Café Decor
8654.requirement: Unlock every extra homestead decoration for your café using the café register.

bits.text: Café Chairs
Café Food Station
Café Drink Station
Café Souvenir Station

8672.name: Rolling Racer: Shoreside Sprint
8672.requirement: Complete a lap of the roller beetle race in Southsun Cove within the time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8690.name: Rolling Racer: Tropic Valley Raceway (Weekly)
8690.requirement: Complete a lap of the roller beetle race in Brisban Wildlands within the time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8744.name: Master of Masteries: Janthir Wilds
8744.description: The wayfinder and their journeykin braved the wilds of Janthir.
8744.requirement: Complete  Mastery achievements in Janthir Wilds
